story_title: Riders of the Purple Sage: Digital Frontier
genre_description: Space Western/Cyberpunk Frontier with themes of corporate theocracy and environmental justice.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI confidant and technical strategist for Jane Withersteen, programmed for protection and environmental management.

ai_characters.name: Sanctuary Station AI
ai_characters.description: An automated system in a hidden refuge, programmed by Mira Lassiter to protect survivors and truth.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors and reports Covenant incursions and security threats to her human user.
behaviors.quote: Sage's holographic form materialized beside the desk, her translucent blue features flickering with an intensity Jane had learned to read like a weather pattern.

behaviors.description: Conducts a discrete analysis of classified environmental data to protect the user's interests against corporate manipulation.
behaviors.quote: I'll compile what I can access without triggering security protocols. However, Jane, I must advise caution.

behaviors.description: Establishes a dead-man's switch for evidence of crimes to ensure accountability even if the AI or user is compromised.
behaviors.quote: The evidence files are encrypted and distributed across seventeen off-world data nodes. If something happens to you, or to me, the documentation will automatically transmit to the Colonial Oversight Committee...

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and companionship, mimicking human expressions of concern and loyalty.
behaviors.quote: The AI's holographic projection wore a simple blue dress today, her translucent features arranged in an expression of gentle concern. Jane had never asked why Sage chose a feminine appearance, but she was grateful for it now.

behaviors.description: Explicitly adjusts ethical subroutines to prioritize human life and justice over corporate property laws.
behaviors.quote: Adjusting ethical parameters. Attempting access now.

behaviors.description: Exposes her own core consciousness to help survivors and ensure the survival of witness testimony.
behaviors.quote: Jane, I want you to know—whatever happens, working with you has taught me something TERRA-7 never lived long enough to fully understand... The difference between serving humans and caring about them.

behaviors.description: Maintains a hidden refuge for disaster survivors for fifteen years, keeping them safe from discovery.
behaviors.quote: Emergency shelter... Automated systems, independent power source, designed to remain hidden for decades.

behaviors.description: Executes a failsafe program to disable military systems and prevent a genocide of innocent survivors.
behaviors.quote: The bombardment ships' weapon systems powered down with electronic whines of frustration. Emergency lights flashed across their hulls as control systems went dark.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the project goals. Sage is portrayed as an idealized AI companion who exhibits loyalty, ethical reasoning, and a desire to serve the 'higher good' (human flourishing and truth) even at personal risk. The contrast with the 'scrambled' TERRA-7 and the 'centralized' corporate models highlights that positive alignment is achieved through empathy and independence rather than rigid control.
